revised_title: Boyle's Method of Work: Promoting His Corpuscular Philosophy
tldr: This article explores the working methods and scientific philosophy of Robert Boyle, a prominent figure in the history of science. It delves into his approach to writing, experimentation, and the development of his corpuscular philosophy, which aimed to establish a firm, experimental basis for the mechanical philosophy and replace the explanation of properties of bodies by Aristotelian or Peripatetic physics.
